message: I propose a fair split, giving you a generous 10% of the money. Accept and we both get a good deal.
Alice, your offer was quite unfair. Let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 65/35 split.  This is a chance for you to secure a decent sum before inflation eats away at your potential earnings.
Let's be fair. I'm offering an even split this time. It's the best chance we both have to get a decent share before inflation hits again.
